FuncDef: This command creates a context for configuring a RIP group of neighbors. RIP groups are a way of logically associating RIP neighbor interfaces to facilitate a common configuration for RIP interfaces.

ParaDef.Info: The RIP group name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes.
